BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Alliance of Motion Pictures and Television Producers to engage in good faith negotiations that will result in a fair contract for all Writers Guild of America members.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Alliance of Motion Pictures and Television Producers to engage in good faith negotiations that will result in a fair contract for all Writers Guild of America members.

Items.Title: Resolution expressing unwavering support of striking SAG-AFTRA members in their pursuit of a fair and just contract.

Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Expressing unwavering support of striking SAG-AFTRA members in their pursuit of a fair and just contract.
